tool.name: reheader
tool.description: Rename sequence header in FASTQ file

param.name: inputfile
param.label: Short read data from your current history

tool.help:
This tool is used to rename the sequence header in FASTQ file by appending SAMPLEFILENAME/1 to the end of the sequence header for the forward read or SAMPLEFILENAME_2 to the end of the sequence header for the reverse read. Example: Forward Read Input sequence header : @M03033:102:000000000-ATN0P:1:1101:9793:1042 Output sequence header : @M03033:102:000000000-ATN0P:1:1101:9793:1042_Sample1/1
Reverse Read Input sequence header : @M03033:102:000000000-ATN0P:1:1101:9793:1042 Output sequence header : @M03033:102:000000000-ATN0P:1:1101:9793:1042_Sample1/2
